Verses: 1 gnaanamulla Magan Thagappanudaiya Podhagaththaik Ketkiraan; Pariyaasakkaarano Kadindhukolludhalukku Sevikodaan.
2 manushan Than Vaayin Balanaal Nanmaiyaip Pusippaan; Dhunmaarkkanin Aaththumaavo Kodumaiyaip Pusikkum.
3 than Vaayaik Kaakkiravan Than Praananaik Kaakkiraan; Than Udhadugalai Virivaaith Thirakkiravano Kalakkamadaivaan.
4 somberiyudaiya Aaththumaa Virumbiyum Ondrum Peraadhu; Jaakkiradhaiyullavargaludaiya Aaththumaavo Pushtiyaagum.
5 needhimaan Poippechchai Verukkiraan; Dhunmaarkkano Vetkamum Lachchaiyum Undaakkugiraan.
6 needhi Uththamamaarkkaththaanaith Tharkaakkum; Dhunmaarkkamo Paaviyaik Kavizhththuppodum.
7 ondrumillaadhirukkath Thannai Selvanaagap Paaraattugiravanum Undu; Migundha Selvamirukkath Thannaith Thariththiranaagap Paaraattugiravanum Undu.
8 manushanudaiya Aisuvariyam Avan Praananai Meetkum; Thariththirano Mirattudhalaik Kelaadhirukkiraan.
9 needhimaangalin Velichcham Sandhoshippikkum; Dhunmaarkkarin Dheebamo Anaindhupom.
10 agandhaiyinaalmaaththiram Vaadhu Pirakkum; Aalosanaiyaik Ketkiravargalidaththilo Gnaanam Undu.
11 vanjanaiyaal Thedina Porul Kuraindhupom; Kaippaadaai Serkkiravano Viruththiyadaivaan.
12 nedungaalamaaik Kaaththirukkudhal Irudhayaththai Ilaikkappannum; Virumbinadhu Varumbodho Jeevavirutchampol Irukkum.
13 thiruvasanaththai Avamadhikkiravan Naasamadaivaan; Karpanaikku Bayappadugiravano Balanadaivaan.
14 gnaanavaangaludaiya Podhagam Jeevaootru; Adhinaal Maranakkannigalukkuth Thappalaam.
15 narbuththi Dhayaiyai Undaakkum; Dhrogigaludaiya Vazhiyo Karadumuradaanadhu.
16 vivegiyaanavan Arivodu Nadandhukollugiraan, Moodano Than Moodaththanaththai Velippaduththugiraan.
17 dhrogamulla Thoodhan Theedhile Vizhuvaan; Unmaiyulla Sthaanaabadhiyo Oushadham.
18 buththimadhigalaith Thallugiravan Thariththiraththaiyum Lachchaiyaiyum Adaivaan; Kadindhukolludhalaik Gavaniththu Nadakkiravano Ganamadaivaan.
19 vaanjai Niraiveruvadhu Aaththumaavukku Inidhu; Theemaiyai Vittu Vilaguvadhu Moodarukku Aruvaruppu.
20 gnaanigalode Sanjarikkiravan Gnaanamadaivaan; Moodarukkuth Thozhano Naasamadaivaan.
21 paavigalaith Theevinai Thodarum; Needhimaangalukko Nanmai Balanaaga Varum.
22 nallavan Than Pillaigalin Pillaigalukku Sudhandharam Vaiththuppogiraan: Paaviyin Aasthiyo Needhimaanukkaaga Serththuvaikkappadum.
23 ezhaigalin Vayal Migudhiyaana Aagaaraththai Vilaivikkum; Nyaayam Kidaiyaamal Kettuppogiravargalum Undu.
24 pirambaik Kaiyaadaadhavan Than Maganaip Pagaikkiraan; Avanmel Anbaayirukkiravano Avanai Erkanave Dhandikkiraan.
25 needhimaan Thanakkuth Thrupdhiyaagap Pusikkiraan; Dhunmaarkkarudaiya Vayiro Pasiththirukkum.
